    About Me

    Hello, I'm Gharda, I am a person with many interests spanning throughout a diverse array of fields from science, engineering, business, social science, philosophy, and beyond. Through this platform, I aim to open a window into my world and share the insights, musings, and discoveries that shape my professional and personal landscape. Join me on this exploration of ideas and let's embark on a journey of knowledge and inspiration together.

    test

    Topic of Interests

    Below are just some of the topics I am currently interested in. It is by no means an exhaustive list and subject to change without notice

    • Natural Science and Engineering: control theory, complexity, machine learning, theoretical physics.
    • Social Science: business, economy, psychology, personal finance, investment.
    • Others: productivity, books, anime, video games, football, basketball

    Books

    In my spare time, I like to read some books on the topic of physics, sociology, philosophy, personal finance, fictions, and more. Some of the books I like the most:

    • Tetralogi Buru - Pramoedya Ananta Toer
    • Thinking, Fast, and Slow - Daniel Kahneman
    • 1984 - George Orwell
    • Kafka on the Shore - Haruki Murakami
    • The Problem of Philosophy - Bertrand Russel
    • Guns, Germs, and Steel: The Fates of Human Societies - Jared Diamond
    • How to Be a Stoic: Using Ancient Philosophy to Live a Modern Life - Massimo Pigliucci
    • Cosmos - Carl Sagan
    • Your Money or Your Life - Joe Dominguez
    • Good Economics for Hard Times: Better Answers to Our Biggest Problems - Abhijit Banerjee & Esther Duflo
    • Astrophysics for People in a Hurry - Neil deGrasse Tyson

    Games

    I also like to play video games from time to time. One of the things I need to decide on a weekend is to choose between books and video games. Some of the games I like (current top of mind):

    • Stardew Valley
    • Chrono Trigger
    • Zelda series
    • Harvest Moon: Back to Nature
    • Xenoblade Chronicles series
    • Dragon Ball Z: Kakarot
    • Tony Hawk's Underground
